import React from 'react' function Display({movies,setMovies,AddtoWatchlist}) { return (
{/* render the bots in cards */}
{ movies.map((movie)=>(
{movie.title}

{bot.catchphrase}

{/* style the bot details */}

{movie.genres}

{movie.rating}

{movie.language}

)) }
) } export default Display
